string.value: Like #p2101000# suggested, you went the Red Scorpions' hideout and stole their treasure. Now you have to drop it off at secret spots inside residents' houses. Sirin says houses marked with an X are associated with the Red Scorpions, so you should avoid those.
You left the treasures at homes marked with an O. That should be enough revenge against the Red Scorpions...
A huge treasure chest can be found containing an amazing amount of treasures. All of them stolen by the Red Scorpions. \r\n#L0# #b Take some to distribute among the people in town.
Remove the treasure from the chest and place it in a pocket.
#b(Now, to give these to the people in town who need it.)#k
Hahaha, looking at you, I can tell you took the stolen treasures from the Red Scorpions and gave them to the people of #m260000000#. Feel better now?
The silly queen was already a big enough headache for everyone in #m260000000#, and now the Red Scorpions... Seriously, why are things in #m260000000# are becoming such a mess?
